HDG.BC.content: play of Being, singular univocity of unique [plurivocity?] > Being that which opens, unlocks “openness” of there? [Being opens ontological difference?] > Being sets Being/beings apart, places us into this apartness & the free, liberation in belongingness to Being [Schelling on freedom]

[Being opens ontological difference?] > Being sets Being/beings apart, places us into this apartness & the free, liberation in belongingness to Being [Schelling on freedom]

HDG.FS.content: for Hegel, need for unity because unity never given immediately, otherwise [unity given immediately]: Schelling’s “night where all cows are black”
HDG.FS.linkedContent: for Hegel, need for unity because unity never given immediately, otherwise [unity given immediately]: Schelling’s “night where all cows are black”

HDG.CCP.content: (only an assertion re: relation of truth to man) truth remains independent of man: Gegnet uses man’s nature (Gelassenheit to Gegnet) w/ respect to man and to sustain determining [of things] [Schelling on independence in Investiga…Human Freedom] > man is he who’s made use of nature of truth
